title: Assateague Island National Seashore: Calendar
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Calendar            Calendar               Ranger Guided Programs   Join us on a ranger guided program and learn more about the barrier island environment.        Centennial Special Events   We've got a line up of special events to help celebrate the National Park Service's Centennial. Join the birthday party!            Assateague Island National Seashore offers many ranger guided programs that are not listed in the calendar. Please visit our Ranger Guided Programs page for current programs.         Keyword       By Date     Start Date      End Date          Search         Upcoming Events    Showing 1 results    Show ALL instances of recurring events   RSS Feed      Assateague Island National Seashore Piecing Together a Changing Planet      Location: Herbert H. Bateman Center, Chincoteague National Wildlife Refuge Fees: Exhibit is free but Chincoteague National Wildlife Refuge entrance fees may apply.     Monday, August 15, 2016 Everyday  from 08/15/2016 to 09/15/2016 Piecing Together a Changing Planet, a juried show of 26 art quilts created by over 20 Florida artists will be displayed at the Herbert H. Bateman Center in the Chincoteague National Wildlife Refuge from August 15 to September 15, 2016. View Details
